attributes.action: ensure that all Local Authorities retain weekly refuse collections from private dwellings in their areas in accordance with the Public Health Act 1875 and to declare illegal any fines, taxes or other payments, proposed or already levied, upon residents for the collection and/or disposal of household rubbish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
